item.text: A city within a city, or a secondary city related to, but physically distant from the primary city. The purpose of a lifeboat city is the same as a lifeboat's purpose for a ship - to provide a haven for life should a set of technological preconditions be met to sink the ship (or the city).

A city within a city, or a secondary city related to, but physically distant from the primary city. The purpose of a lifeboat city is the same as a lifeboat's purpose for a ship - to provide a haven for life should a set of technological preconditions be met to sink the ship (or the city).
